channel.title: New Wild Thing's available on eBay
channel.description: Just as a note to others, it seems a few people hope (were hoping) to find one. I was searching for a while too, now i found this https://www.ebay.com/itm/304566464747 and ordered one. USD 200, free shipping. It should arrive by mid. Aug.

item.title: New Wild Thing's available on eBay
item.dc:creator: sirtet
item.description:
Just as a note to others, it seems a few people hope (were hoping) to find one.
I was searching for a while too, now i found this

eBay

Power Wheels Wild Thing Electric Toy Car | eBay

Kids will love hopping into the extra-wide seat and taking it for a spin. Power Wheels Wild Thing 12V Battery-Powered Ride On, Blue Extra-wide seat makes it extra fun.

and ordered one. USD 200, free shipping.
It should arrive by mid. Aug.
